title: Topic 001 Question 005
body: A company migrates an on-premises Windows virtual machine (VM) to Azure. An administrator enables backups for the VM by using the Azure portal.
The company reports that the Azure VM backup job is failing.
You need to troubleshoot the issue.
options: Install the VM guest agent with administrative permissions.
Create a new manual backup in Backup center.
Enable replication and create a recovery plan for the backup vault.
Configure the retention range of the current backup policy for the VM.
